title: AutoBot - Cold Email Automation
description: AI-powered cold email automation platform for job applications. • Resume upload & parsing • Contact list processing • AI email generation with Google Gemini • Email automation with tracking • Built with Next.js, TypeScript & Tailwind CSS

title: Samridhya - Digital Loan Platform
description: Full-stack development for leading Indian loan platform. • Website redesign with modern animations • Custom CMS (/cms) with rich text editor • Dynamic blog system (/blog) with SEO • Firebase functions & authentication • Loan calculator & credit score checker • Real-time loan tracking features

title: AnyChat Web App
description: Real-time chat application with instant messaging capabilities. • No authentication required for quick access • User list & one-on-one messaging • Real-time updates with WebSocket • Clean & modern UI design • Fast & responsive communication

title: Ravana AI Voice Assistant
description: AI voice assistant that behaves like Ravana character. • Voice interaction & speech recognition • Character-based AI responses • Real-time voice processing • Interactive conversation interface • Modern React & Vite development • Deployed on Vercel platform

title: DevConnect - Social Media for Developers
description: Full-stack social media platform designed specifically for developers. • User authentication & profiles • Post sharing & interactions • Real-time messaging & notifications • Developer-focused features • MongoDB database integration • React Redux state management • Collaborative development with team

title: NoteCrypt - Encrypted Note Taking
description: Secure digital note-taking application with end-to-end encryption. • Complete CRUD operations for notes • AES encryption on client-side • Firebase authentication & Firestore • Notes encrypted before database storage • Only user can decrypt & read notes • Privacy-focused with zero-knowledge architecture

title: FitBharat
description: Comprehensive fitness & wellness app with gamified challenges. • Community interaction features • Personalized fitness tracking • React Native & MongoDB • Microservices architecture

title: BLIS (Book Libraries In Seconds)
description: Cross-platform study room booking app with subscriptions. • Map-based library discovery • Secure payment integration • Real-time booking management • Admin dashboard for library owners
